  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_351</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función afín</string>
            <string language="en">Affine function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Läutern Sie Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affinez la fonction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Affine a função</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Affini la funzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρίστε τη λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones la función afín. Se estudia la función afín o función polinómica de primer grado, su gráfica y su fórmula.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain affine functions. It studies affine functions (or first degree polynomial function), their graphs and formulae.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta</string>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">polinomio de primer grado</string>
            <string language="en">first degree polynomial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">afín</string>
            <string language="en">affine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welchen zu erklären 
Gebrauchsimulationen Funktionen läutern Sie. Sie studiert 
läutert Funktionen (oder polynomische Funktion des ersten Grads), 
ihre Diagramme und Formeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations à expliquer affinez les fonctions. Elle étudie 
affinent des fonctions (ou la fonction polynôme de premier degré), 
leurs graphiques et formules.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos a 
explicar affine funções. Estuda affine funções (ou a 
função polynomial do primeiro grau), os seus gráficos e fórmulas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi da 
spiegare affini le funzioni. Studia affina le funzioni (o 
funzione polinomiale di primo grado), i loro grafici e formule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί προσομοιώσεις 
που εξηγούν καθαρίζει λειτουργεί. Μελετά καθαρίζει τις 
λειτουργίες (ή την πολυωνυμική λειτουργία πρώτου βαθμού), τις 
γραφικές παραστάσεις και τους τύπους τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erstes Gradpolynom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">läutern Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diagramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ligne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">premier polynôme de degré</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">affinez</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graphique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fonction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
